flounder.textures

Class TextureTessellatorAtlas

  • java.lang.Object
    • flounder.textures.TextureTessellatorAtlas

  • public class TextureTessellatorAtlas
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that can create a tessellator around a texture.

    • Constructor Summary
